summary: A highly experienced Sales and Business Development Manager with cross cultural exposure Pieter has worked around the globe in places such as Dubai, Malaysia, Spain, France, Thailand, Singapore, Colombia, Ecuador, UK, Trinidad & Tobago and Kazakhstan. With a vast network and in depth knowledge of both the Maritime , Oil & Gas and sustainable & smart energy systems industries, Pieter is also able to communicate fluently with a variety of business stakeholders in English, Spanish and Dutch.
